EXTRACTED VALUE: There aren't enough courses - six feels more like an appetizer than a gourmet feast - and no obvious expectation of future additions via Xbox Live.
Survival mode is where it's at in terms of ultra-difficulty - completing all levels without a single death requires a superhuman level of dedication.
Somehow, a little bit lost in the beauty and the emotion of Final Fantasy VIII is the actual game system.
A fantastic title for the Xbox Live Arcade because it's easily accessible and a game you can spend hours or minutes on.
Arcade shooter meets online first-person shooter and the results can be pretty enjoyable.
Level design is mediocre and the lack of any single player mode makes the game feel unsatisfying.
MX vs. ATV Untamed is a lot like a long race on an oval track - it's fun for a bit but then grows steadily more repetitive.
Magical game fun for kids; brief fun for adults. [Aug 2007, p.99]
This game will require a lot of patience to play and master.
